title: Hotel Management Intern
description: Gain hands-on experience in hotel operations including front desk, housekeeping, and guest services. Learn about revenue management and hotel booking systems. Assist in organizing events and managing customer relationships.

title: Travel Planning Intern
description: Assist clients in planning customized travel itineraries and vacation packages. Research destinations and coordinate with travel vendors for bookings. Learn about travel industry software and customer service best practices.

title: Event Management Intern
description: Support planning and execution of corporate events, weddings, and conferences. Coordinate with vendors, manage logistics, and ensure smooth event operations. Learn about event marketing and customer experience management.

title: Restaurant Management Intern
description: Learn restaurant operations including menu planning, inventory management, and customer service excellence. Assist in staff training and quality control procedures. Support cost management and revenue optimization initiatives.

title: Resort Operations Intern
description: Support resort management activities including guest services, housekeeping coordination, and recreational program management. Assist in booking systems and customer relationship management. Learn about hospitality software and revenue management.

title: Cruise Operations Intern
description: Support cruise ship operations including guest entertainment, dining services, and shore excursion coordination. Learn about maritime hospitality and international travel regulations. Assist in guest relations and activity planning.

title: Travel Technology Intern
description: Work on travel booking platforms and mobile applications for tourism services. Support API integrations with airlines, hotels, and travel suppliers. Assist in developing travel recommendation systems and user experience improvements.

title: Tourism Marketing Intern
description: Promote tourist destinations and hospitality services through digital marketing campaigns. Create travel content and manage social media presence for tourism boards. Support partnership development with travel agencies and tour operators.

title: Aviation Management Intern
description: Support airport operations and airline customer service management. Assist in flight scheduling and crew resource planning. Learn about aviation safety regulations and passenger service standards.

title: Spa and Wellness Intern
description: Support spa operations and wellness program development in hospitality settings. Assist in treatment scheduling and customer wellness consultations. Learn about holistic health practices and wellness tourism trends.
